content:
Collections

  • A collection is a set of URIs listing the member resources

    • A resource may have more than one URI/URL, hence a resource may be accessible via more than one collection.

  • Advanced Collections specification defines ordered collections:

    • The server persistently stores a single ordering of the resources in a collection.
    • A listing of the members of a collection returns the resources in that order.
